name: i want a ceiling plant holder
name_original: i want a ceiling plant holder
description:
What happens when you desperately want a ceiling plant holder but you don't want to go outside to go get one? A point-and-click game about searching it up on the Internet, of course! 

FEATURES:

  • Some sort of strange internet-simulator 
  • Ads. Everywhere.
  • Mom's old computer
  • Yearning for a ceiling plant holder

Coded in p5.js for a class assignment.
